members.name: compact
members.descriptionHtml: To have top compact card only

members.name: expanded
members.descriptionHtml: To have both top compact and bottom expanded card

members.name: expanding
members.descriptionHtml: File card consisting of two parts: compact and expanded. Has some default sizes if not specified.

members.name: plain
members.descriptionHtml: Plain card consisting of one part responsive to the size of content.

members.name: compactCardHeight
members.descriptionHtml: Height of compact card

members.name: expandedCardHeight
members.descriptionHtml: Height of expanded card

members.name: mode
members.descriptionHtml: Use to open the card in expanded format and not wait for the delay

members.name: onRenderCompactCard
members.descriptionHtml: Render function to populate compact content area

members.name: onRenderExpandedCard
members.descriptionHtml: Render function to populate expanded content area

members.name: compactCardHeight
members.descriptionHtml: Height of the compact section of the card.

members.name: expandedCardFirstFrameRendered
members.descriptionHtml: Boolean flag that expanded card is in Expanded.mode === expanded && first frame was rendered.

members.name: expandedCardHeight
members.descriptionHtml: Height of the expanded section of the card.

members.name: needsScroll
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the content of the expanded card overflows vertically.

members.name: compactCard
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the main card element.

members.name: expandedCard
members.descriptionHtml: Base Style for the expanded card content.

members.name: expandedCardScroll
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the expanded card scroll content.

members.name: cardDismissDelay
members.descriptionHtml: Length of card dismiss delay. A min number is necessary for pointer to hop between target and card

members.name: cardOpenDelay
members.descriptionHtml: Length of compact card delay

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional CSS class(es) to apply to the HoverCard root element.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IHoverCardHost interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: expandedCardOpenDelay
members.descriptionHtml: Time in ms when expanded card should open after compact card

members.name: expandingCardProps
members.descriptionHtml: Additional ExpandingCard props to pass through HoverCard like renderers, target. gapSpace etc. Used along with 'type' prop set to HoverCardType.expanding. Reference detail properties in ICardProps and IExpandingCardProps.

members.name: instantOpenOnClick
members.descriptionHtml: Enables instant open of the full card upon click

members.name: onCardExpand
members.descriptionHtml: Callback when visible card is expanded.

members.name: onCardHide
members.descriptionHtml: Callback when card hides

members.name: onCardVisible
members.descriptionHtml: Callback when card becomes visible

members.name: openHotKey
members.descriptionHtml: HotKey used for opening the HoverCard when tabbed to target.

members.name: plainCardProps
members.descriptionHtml: Additional PlainCard props to pass through HoverCard like renderers, target, gapSpace etc. Used along with 'type' prop set to HoverCardType.plain. See for more details ICardProps and IPlainCardProps interfaces.

members.name: setAriaDescribedBy
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not to mark the container as described by the hover card. If not specified, the caller should mark as element as described by the hover card id.

members.name: setInitialFocus
members.descriptionHtml: Set to true to set focus on the first focusable element in the card. Works in pair with the 'trapFocus' prop.

members.name: shouldBlockHoverCard
members.descriptionHtml: Should block hover card or not

members.name: sticky
members.descriptionHtml: If true disables Card dismiss upon mouse leave, so that card sticks around.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Custom styles for this component

members.name: target
members.descriptionHtml: Optional target element to tag hover card on. If not provided and using HoverCard as a wrapper, don't set 'data-is-focusable=true' attribute to the root of the wrapped child. When no target given, HoverCard will use it's root as a target and become the focusable element with a focus listener attached to it.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by higher order component.

members.name: trapFocus
members.descriptionHtml: Set to true if you want to render the content of the HoverCard in a FocusTrapZone for accessibility reasons. Optionally 'setInitialFocus' prop can be set to true to move focus inside the FocusTrapZone.

members.name: type
members.descriptionHtml: Type of the hover card to render.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Optional className(s) for the host div of HoverCard.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: host
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the host element in the default enabled, non-toggled state.

members.name: onRenderPlainCard
members.descriptionHtml: Render function to populate compact content area

members.name: hotKey
members.descriptionHtml: Open card by hot key

members.name: hover
members.descriptionHtml: Open card by hover
